DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety Diclofenac [ Test ] Capsules treatment osteoarthritis pain knee hip .
DOC.brief_title: Open-Label Study Diclofenac Capsules Treat Osteoarthritis Pain
DOC.criteria: Male female ≥ [ great equal ] 40 year age If participant previous DIC30805 study , complete study discontinue lack efficacy safety Has diagnosis OA hip knee ongoing knee and/or articular hip pain Is current chronic user nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) and/or acetaminophen his/her OA pain anticipated benefit continuous treatment therapeutic dos NSAIDs . A current chronic user define subject used treatment ≥ [ great equal ] 20 day last 30 day screen Has know history allergic reaction clinically significant intolerance acetaminophen , aspirin , nonsteroid antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) , include diclofenac Requires chronic use opioid opioid combination product control OA pain knee hip Has clinically significant unstable cardiac , respiratory , neurological , immunological , hematological , renal disease Has significant difficulty swallow capsule unable tolerate oral medication
